name: ARENA ROUGE(DEMO)
description:
You find your self in a foreign land, From what you can tell its a typical RPG "slay the monsters and you win". So you shall do just that. 

More content is planned to come!!!!

CONTROLS

Escape brings up the menu, Arrow keys to move, Enter or space to confirm.

 Songs and sound effects used in this demo can be found in the link below

https://soundcloud.com/lorenzo-lugo/sets/arena-rouge-soundtrack
